subject: Baseball
World Series
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Before Game 3 of the 2011 World Series was over, someone had updated the Wikipedia page of Ron Kulpa, the first-base umpire, to note that he had made “the worst call in Major League Baseball history.”
snippet: Before Game 3 of the 2011 World Series was over, someone had updated the Wikipedia page of Ron Kulpa, the first-base umpire, to note that he had made “the worst call in Major League Baseball history.”
